LanguageData.AteChocoPasteMeal.stages.ate_chocolate_p: I ate a chocolate paste meal, tasty!
LanguageData.AteFinePasteMeal.stages.ate_fine_paste_m: the only thing that would make this better is the texture, it tastes fine!
LanguageData.AteFowlMeal.stages.ate_fowl_meal.label: ate fowl meal
LanguageData.AteFowlMeal.stages.ate_fowl_meal.descrip: I don't know what I just ate but it made me want to vomit.
